comments:
We are invoking "java startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main -data 
workspace -application org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.Generator" command over 
and over again to generate Java source codes from EMF genmodel files.

From time to time, we will get the following exceptions but it seems Eclipse 
runtime will recover and continue. However, such exceptions did cause lots of 
build time confusions. -
[app-bindings/gen.model.ref/GenModelECore] >>  Creating EMF project project
[app-bindings/gen.model.ref/GenModelECore] >>  Opening project.
[app-bindings/gen.model.ref/GenModelECore] >>  Refreshing /project.
[app-bindings/gen.model.ref/GenModelECore] >>  Setting classpath for: project 
[app-bindings/gen.model.ref/GenModelECore] >>  Setting classpath for: project

org/eclipse/core/internal/utils/StringPool

org.eclipse.core.internal.utils.StringPoolJob.shareStrings
(StringPoolJob.java:111)

org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)
